short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlocks all features of Acer Booster PWA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Acer Booster Extension unlocks all the Acer Booster PWA features by connecting with necessary APIs. This extension allows Acer Booster PWA to monitor system performance in real-time. Whether you're managing performance or organizing files, this extension makes it possible for the Acer Booster app to give you the tools you need.
By installing the Acer Booster Extension, you will get:
•⁠  ⁠Dashboard (Instant cleaner, Memory/RAM used & total capacity)
•⁠  ⁠CPU Information Overview
•⁠  ⁠Download Folder Management

Important notes:
•⁠  ⁠The Acer Booster PWA can be opened here: https://acerpartners.com/acerbooster
